ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(Defaults) 
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(GraphicalUtils) 
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(Rendering)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(Widgets)

ADD_LIBRARY(UserInterface 
  MainWindow.cpp
  MainWindow.h
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(UserInterface PUBLIC 
  ${VTK_LIBRARIES}
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Widgets
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Core
  Defaults
  GraphicalUtils
  Rendering
  Widgets
)

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(UserInterface PUBLIC
    ${PRJ_SOURCE_DIR}/src/UserInterface
    ${PRJ_SOURCE_DIR}/src/UserInterface/Defaults)

# Autogenerated uic files
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(UserInterface INTERFACE 
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/UserInterface_autogen/include
)
